parameters.name: Description
parameters.description: The description of the capacity reservation. The description must be 2 to 256 characters in length. It cannot start with `http://` or `https://`.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The expiration time of the capacity reservation. This parameter takes effect only when `EndTimeType` is set to Limited. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the `yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ` format. The time must be in UTC. For more information, see [ISO 8601](~~25696~~).

parameters.name: EndTimeType
parameters.description:
The release mode of the capacity reservation. Valid values:

*   Limited: The capacity reservation is automatically released at the specified point in time. If you configure this parameter, you must also configure `EndTime`.
*   Unlimited: The capacity reservation must be manually released. You can release it anytime.

parameters.name: InstanceAmount
parameters.description:
The total number of instances for which capacity is reserved. Valid values: the number of used instances to 1000.

> When you increase the number of instances, the increase may fail due to insufficient resources.

parameters.name: Platform
parameters.description:
The operating system of the image used by the instance. Valid values:

*   Windows
*   Linux

> This parameter is unavailable.

parameters.name: PrivatePoolOptions.Name
parameters.description: The name of the capacity reservation. The name must be 2 to 128 characters in length. It must start with a letter and cannot start with `http://` or `https://`. It can contain letters, digits, colons (:), underscores (\_), and hyphens (-).

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the capacity reservation. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~25609~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description:
The mode in which the capacity reservation takes effect. Only immediate capacity reservations are supported. You do not need to specify a value for this parameter.

> If you do not specify a value for this parameter, the capacity reservation immediately takes effect.
